tool_description: Detects the language of review text content using statistical analysis and machine learning models.

review_texts.description: Array of review text content to analyze

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for language detection (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid review_texts: Input must be a non-empty array of text strings. Ensure review content is properly extracted.
Confidence threshold out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Lower values include less certain detections.
Text too short: Some reviews may be too short for reliable language detection. Minimum 10 characters recommended.
Processing limit exceeded: Maximum 2000 texts can be processed at once. Split large batches for better performance.
usage: Provide array of review_texts and optionally set confidence_threshold. The tool will detect languages and return language codes with confidence scores.

detected_languages.description: Array of detected language codes (ISO 639-1 format)

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each language detection

language_distribution.description: Summary of language distribution in the format 'language:count'

uncertain_detections.description: Number of texts with confidence below threshold
